Firestrike grins.  "My pleasure."  He turns and walks out of the 
room.  He walks straight to the control room.  Before the door can 
slide open he brings his arm up, a panel slides open as a gun flps 
out into his hand.  "Why hello there" he points it at the door.  
Pulling the trigger the small pistol blasts the door to nothing leaving 
destruction for his door.  HE slowly paces in.  "Soundwave andm 
inions.  Megatron has a little change of, well body, but heart as 
well.  I believe, and that is what goes, that you should die, and 
now, so does Megs." he sais as he raises the gun and points it at 
Frenzy first.
